EmailTemplate.description: used to notify PP owner when Integration complete
EmailTemplate.name: PP Integration Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Integration has finished the work on your Project Piece {!Project_Piece__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have been assigned as the owner of a new project for {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Opportunity__c}. You may view a report of the Project Pieces for this Project by clicking the link below:
View Report
You may assign the Project Pieces by clicking into each Project Piece Number one by one from the above report, or do a "multi-select" assignment of Project Pieces by viewing and multi-select assigning them through this link:
Assign View
(The Project Pieces can be sorted by Project Number or by Account Name from the above view)
